<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Bosun](/NPCs.aspx?ID=953)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A ship's boatswain, or bosun, leads the deckhands who maintain the ship.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Seafarer_Bosun.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Bosun](/NPCs.aspx?ID=953)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 243</row>

**Perception** +8

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), naval pike (functions as [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 45

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
naval pike +11,
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
naval pike +13 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Bosun's Command** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The bosun orders an ally to attack or to get in position. Until the end of the ally's next turn, they gain the bosun's choice of a +2 status bonus to attack rolls or a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds.

**Pike and Strike** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The bosun Strikes with their naval pike. If this Strike hits, the bosun can either move the target 5 feet within the pike's reach or make a fist Strike against the target without increasing their multiple attack penalty until after the fist Strike.

</column>
